      <div id="leftboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox19646574">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="19646574">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title19646574">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Need help with your research?
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content19646574">
          <p>
          </p>
          <p>
           Contact:
          </p>
          <p>
           Kelly Cannon
           <br />
           Humanities &amp; Business Librarian
           <br />
           phone: x3602
           <br />
           email: kcannon@muhlenberg.edu
           <br />
           IM (AIM, Yahoo): refcannon
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt19646574" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox19646575">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="19646575">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title19646575">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Getting to the full text
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content19646575">
          <p>
           Once you have found the citation of a journal article you're interested in, click on the
           <strong>
            Check for Full Text
           </strong>
           <span>
            &nbsp;buttons
           </span>
           &nbsp;found next to the citation, or run a journal title search in Trexler Library's
           <a href="https://muhlenberg.on.worldcat.org/advancedsearch" target="_blank">
            Encompass Search.
           </a>
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt19646575" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div id="contentcenter" style="width:520px;padding-left:0px; margin-left:0px; margin-right:8px; float:left;">
      <div id="centerboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox19646576">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="19646576">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title19646576">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Reference works (good for generating topics and recommending sources)
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content19646576">
          <div id="boxatt19646576" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link22969345">
              <a id="link_22969345" href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.credoreference.com" target="_blank" onclick="hit(22969345,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Sex, Beauty and the Body in Brazil and the Caribbean', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 18508858}); ">
               Credo Reference
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Hundreds of authoritative dictionaries, encyclopedias, fact books, guides, companions and more from respected publishers across dozens of major subject areas.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link22969665">
              <a id="link_22969665" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://find.galegroup.com/openurl/openurl?url_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;url_ctx_fmt=info:ofi/fmt:kev:mtx:ctx&amp;req_dat=info:sid/gale:ugnid:mul_coll&amp;res_id=info:sid/gale:GVRL&amp;ctx_enc=info:ofi:enc:UTF-8&amp;rft_val_fmt=info:ofi/fmt:kev:mtx:book&amp;rft_id=info:sid/gale:bmcode:recid/1UMT" target="_blank" onclick="hit(22969665,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Sex, Beauty and the Body in Brazil and the Caribbean', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12402162}); ">
               Encyclopedia of Latin American History and Culture
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Newly revised and online, well-respected resource complete with recommended readings for further study.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link22969717">
              <a id="link_22969717" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://find.galegroup.com/openurl/openurl?url_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;url_ctx_fmt=info:ofi/fmt:kev:mtx:ctx&amp;req_dat=info:sid/gale:ugnid:mul_coll&amp;res_id=info:sid/gale:GVRL&amp;ctx_enc=info:ofi:enc:UTF-8&amp;rft_val_fmt=info:ofi/fmt:kev:mtx:book&amp;rft_id=info:sid/gale:bmcode:recid/2GEK" target="_blank" onclick="hit(22969717,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Sex, Beauty and the Body in Brazil and the Caribbean', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12769460}); ">
               Encyclopedia of Women and Society
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Covers the major theories, research, people, and issues in contemporary gender studies. Offers a cross-national/cross-cultural perspective that provides comparative analyses of the life experiences of men and women around the world.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox19646577">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="19646577">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title19646577">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Finding primary documents
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content19646577">
          <p>
           Primary documents can be found abundantly by using any standard web search engine like Google. However,
           <a href="http://muhlenberg.on.worldcat.org/advancedsearch">
            Encompass
           </a>
           or
           <a href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://newfirstsearch.oclc.org/done=http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu//;dbname=worldcat;fsip">
            WorldCat
           </a>
           (see description below) can be good sources for primary documents published in book form.
          </p>
          <p>
           One excellent website offering access to primary documentation is
           <a href="http://slavevoyages.org/tast/index.faces">
            Trans-Atlantic Slave Trade Database
           </a>
           , sponsored by Emory University and others.
          </p>
          <p>
           Our library subscribes to a primary documents database called
           <a href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://eebo.chadwyck.com/home">
            Early English Books Online
           </a>
           , covering up to 1700, and
           <a id="link_12344563" href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://infotrac.galegroup.com/itweb/mul_coll?db=ECCO" target="_blank">
            Eighteenth Century Collections Online (ECCO)
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <p>
           <a href="http://books.google.com/">
            Google Books
           </a>
           contains a wealth of pre-copyright (pre-1923) materials.
          </p>
          <p>
           See also the
           <em>
            footnotes of secondary sources
           </em>
           , which often will point to primary documentation.
          </p>
          <p>
          </p>
          <p>
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt19646577" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox19646578">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="19646578">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title19646578">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Authoritative secondary commentary in books
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content19646578">
          <div id="boxatt19646578" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link22969348">
              <a id="link_22969348" href="http://muhlenberg.on.worldcat.org/advancedsearch" target="_blank" onclick="hit(22969348,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Sex, Beauty and the Body in Brazil and the Caribbean', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 18508793}); ">
               Encompass Search
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Encompass Search searches for books and other resources, first in our own library, and then beyond, in other research libraries.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox19646579">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="19646579">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title19646579">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Authoritative secondary commentary in articles
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content19646579">
          <div id="boxatt19646579" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link22969591">
              <a id="link_22969591" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=a9h" target="_blank" onclick="hit(22969591,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Sex, Beauty and the Body in Brazil and the Caribbean', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12343584}); ">
               Academic Search Complete
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Full text access to scholarly and non-scholarly publications in a wide variety of disciplines and subject areas.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link22984223">
              <a id="link_22984223" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=ant" target="_blank" onclick="hit(22984223,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Sex, Beauty and the Body in Brazil and the Caribbean', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12485167}); ">
               Anthropology Plus
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Citations to scholarly journals and books in anthropology, archaeology, and related fields.  Use the Check for Full Text buttons to check for full text online or in the library.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link22969683">
              <a id="link_22969683" href="http://scholar.google.com/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(22969683,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Sex, Beauty and the Body in Brazil and the Caribbean', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 19974037}); ">
               Google Scholar
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               May be used in conjunction with interlibrary loan. Access to full text is maximized by searching from the Muhlenberg network.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link22969349">
              <a id="link_22969349" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=30h" target="_blank" onclick="hit(22969349,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Sex, Beauty and the Body in Brazil and the Caribbean', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12329218}); ">
               Historical Abstracts with Full Text
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Library subscription database. Standard index for peer-reviewed articles and scholarly books on Latin American history.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link22969351">
              <a id="link_22969351" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://www.jstor.org/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(22969351,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Sex, Beauty and the Body in Brazil and the Caribbean', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12286586}); ">
               JSTOR
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Library subscription databse. Archive of the full text of numerous history journals from major academic presses.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link22969724">
              <a id="link_22969724" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://online.sagepub.com/cgi/search" target="_blank" onclick="hit(22969724,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Sex, Beauty and the Body in Brazil and the Caribbean', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12364850}); ">
               Sage Journals Online
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A database of scholarly journals published by Sage, providing wide coverage in all disciplines, but particularly the social sciences.  Full text for articles published 1999 to the present is linked directly in the database; otherwise, search the library catalog by journal titles to check for full text online or in the library.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link22969593">
              <a id="link_22969593" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.proquest.com/socabs/advanced?accountid=40980" target="_blank" onclick="hit(22969593,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Sex, Beauty and the Body in Brazil and the Caribbean', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12811735}); ">
               Sociological Abstracts
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Citations to scholarly journal articles, books, book chapters, dissertations and more in sociology and related disciplines in the social and behavioral sciences. Use the Check for Full Text buttons to check for full text online or in the library.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link22984220">
              <a id="link_22984220" href="http://scholar.google.com/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(22984220,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Sex, Beauty and the Body in Brazil and the Caribbean', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 19974037}); ">
               Google Scholar
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               May be used in conjunction with interlibrary loan. Access to full text is maximized by searching from the Muhlenberg network.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div id="contentright" style="width:209px;float:left; padding-right:0px;">
      <div id="profile5268760" class="profile_wrapper">
      </div>
      <div id="rightboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox19646581">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="19646581">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title19646581">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Citing sources in Chicago style (foot/endnotes and bibliography format)
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content19646581">
          <p>
           For tips on citing print and electronic sources, visit Trexler Library's
           <a href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/research/citation-guides.html">
            <em>
             Citation Guides for Print and Electronic Resources
            </em>
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <p>
           Or visit the
           <a href="http://owl.english.purdue.edu/owl/resource/717/01/">
            <em>
             Online Writing Lab
            </em>
           </a>
           at Purdue.
          </p>
          <p>
           The full text of the Chicago Manual of Style, 16th ed. is available to Muhlenberg College students
           <a href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=Http://www.chicagomanualofstyle.org/16/contents.html">
            here
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <p>
           For automated citation, try the shareware
           <a href="http://www.zotero.org/">
            <em>
             Zotero
            </em>
           </a>
           . Here is a
           <a href="https://www.zotero.org/support/">
            user guide
           </a>
           to Zotero. NOTE: In order to construct footnotes (as opposed to bibliography), the
           <a href="http://www.zotero.org/support/word_processor_plugin_installation_for_zotero_2.1">
            MS Word Plug-In
           </a>
           is needed.
          </p>
          <p>
          </p>
          <p>
           Help with annotated bibliographies
          </p>
          <blockquote>
           <p>
            Visit Purdue's
            <a href="http://owl.english.purdue.edu/handouts/">
             <em>
              Online Writing Lab
             </em>
            </a>
            for definitions and
            <a href="http://owl.english.purdue.edu/owl/resource/614/03/">
             format
            </a>
            of an annotation.
           </p>
          </blockquote>
          <p>
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt19646581" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox19646582">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="19646582">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title19646582">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Articles via interlibrary loan
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content19646582">
          <p>
           Journal articles not found in Trexler Library can be ordered on&nbsp;
           <a href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/services/interlibrary-loan.html">
            interlibrary loan
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt19646582" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
    </div>
